quote: Hope you like them! I made them myself! Aren't they cute? Hehe.
Hehe. Isn't it cute? Hope you like them! They're Kaiser-shaped!
Trick or treat! You know, I read somewhere that chocolate is really good for you, so have lots! I made it myself!
This is one of my special orders! Caddy says they're super fancy. They're a lil' boozy for a fun time!
Doesn't eating milk chocolate just make you feel all warm inside? It's even better if you share it with friends!
